title: Six-day outflow streak hits Bitcoin ETFs, ETH turns positive
summary: The last stretch of August has produced a sharp divergence between spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs. Bitcoin ETFs recorded six consecutive days of outflows, draining nearly $2 billion from funds between Aug. 19 and Aug. 22 alone. In contrast, Ethereum ETFs posted two days of inflows after enduring several red sessions, indicating that investor interest […] The post Six-day outflow streak hits Bitcoin ETFs, ETH turns positive appeared first on CryptoSlate .

title: Why Is Crypto Down Today? – August 25, 2025
summary: The crypto market is down today. BTC and ETH fell around 3% each. "Prevailing optimism means momentum could continue regardless of near-term policy outcomes." The post Why Is Crypto Down Today? – August 25, 2025 appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Four Journalists Among Those Killed in Israeli Strikes in Gaza, Local Officials Say
summary: Gaza-based reporters said the four had worked for various international media outlets. At least four other people were killed in the strikes on a hospital.

title: Humanoid Global Announces CEO Transition
summary: Vancouver, BC, Aug. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Humanoid Global Holdings Corp. (“Humanoid Global” or the “Company”) (CSE:ROBO, FWB:0XM1, OTCPK:RBOHF) announced today changes to its management. title: Spectral Medical Receives US$3 Million From Vantive
summary: TORONTO, Aug. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Spectral Medical Inc. (“Spectral” or the “Company”) (TSX: EDT), a late-stage theranostic company advancing therapeutic options for sepsis and septic shock, today announced that it has received the US$3 million Tranche B advance from Vantive US Healthcare LLC (“Vantive”) pursuant to the previously disclosed senior secured promissory note […]
